entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain or drizzle and ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Rain beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
